## FolderEntryMeta class

metadata to describe where a folder can be found (for root metadata of an account)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class FolderEntryMeta 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)({ name, location })](./opaque.folderentrymeta._constructor_.md) |  | create metadata entry for a folder |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [location](./opaque.folderentrymeta.location.md) |  | <code>string</code> | the public key for the metadata file it is how the file will be queried for (using the same system as for the account metadata) |
|  [name](./opaque.folderentrymeta.name.md) |  | <code>string</code> | a name of the folder shown in the UI |
